= Install from repository =


== Add the repository ==
=== Fedora 14 ===
{{{
su -c 'wget http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/hillwood/Fedora_14/home:hillwood.repo -P /etc/yum.repos.d/'
}}}

=== Fedora 15 ===
{{{
su -c 'wget http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/hillwood/Fedora_15/home:hillwood.repo -P /etc/yum.repos.d/'
}}}

== Install OSD Lyrics ==

Now you can install OSD Lyrics with yum easily :)
{{{
yum makecache
yum install osdlyrics
}}}
Install osdlyrics beta: 
{{{
yum makecache
yum install osdlyrics-beta
}}}

Download from: http://code.google.com/p/osd-lyrics/downloads/list
